name: murty
author: Brendan Murty <b@murty.io> (http://b.murty.io)
description: The Murty website built with Angular and Express, coded with Atom and hosted by Digital Ocean.

scripts.startdev: export APP_DOMAIN=localhost && export APP_PORT=80 && nodemon server.js
scripts.start: export APP_DOMAIN=murty.io && export APP_PORT=80 && forever start -o murty-output.log -e murty-error.log -l murty-forever.log server.js
